metadata.name: Baguette and Red wine without you
metadata.description: I'm interested in the food and drink culture of every country and tribe. I love wine and bread. These two things have a long history with human beings.There is a profound science. The value and beauty of taste has its own distinct art that the baker and the winemaker have concocted. It would be no different from an artist who aims to create art in the direction of each person.
